==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=壹-financial,弌}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
A horizontal stroke, indicating the number one.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ʔit}}. Descendants from the *''ʔit'' etymon account for the majority of the dialectal forms for <tt>ONE</tt> in Chinese (Mandarin, Jin, Gan, Hakka, Hui, Xiang, Yue groups, etc.).

In Min, an additional unrelated form is found and used as the colloquial reading for <tt>ONE</tt>. Compare:
: {{w|Fuzhou}}/Fuding ''suoʔ<sup>8</sup>'', Fuqing ''θyo<sup>8</sup>'', Gutian ''syøʔ<sup>8</sup>'', Ningde ''søʔ<sup>8</sup>'', Zhouning ''sɔʔ<sup>8</sup>'', {{w|Putian}} ''ɬoʔ<sup>8</sup>'', {{w|Xiamen}}/Quanzhou/Yongchun/Zhangzhou ''tsit̚<sup>8</sup>'', Leizhou/{{w|Haikou}} ''ziak<sup>8</sup>'', Longyan ''tse<sup>4</sup>'', Youxiu ''ɕie<sup>7</sup>'', Jian'ou/Songxi ''tsi<sup>5</sup>'', Jianyang ''tsi<sup>8</sup>'', Jian'ou ''tsi<sup>5</sup>''.

Whether all of the forms above are related and their origins remain unelucidated; they may be derived from {{m|zh|蜀}} (cf. {{m|zh|獨||single, alone}}), {{m|zh|隻}} (< {{m|sit-pro|*tjak ~ g-t(j)ik}}) or {{m|zh|禃}}.

Some {{etyl|czo|-}} dialects use {{m|zh|個}} and {{m|zh|寡}} for <tt>ONE</tt>.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[one]]
#* {{zh-x|一 長 一 短|one short and one long}}
# [[each]]; [[every]]
#* {{zh-x|給 他 們 '''一''' 人 一 隻 蘋果。|Give them an apple '''each'''.}}
# [[single]]; [[alone]]
#* {{zh-x|獨自一人|solitary}}
#* {{zh-x|專一|single-minded, loyal}}
# [[whole]]; [[entire]]; [[all]]: [[throughout]]
#* {{zh-x|他們 在 海灘 上 玩 了 一 下午。|They played the '''whole''' afternoon on the beach.}}
#* {{zh-x|《一 生 不 變》|"Unchanging Throughout a Lifetime" ''(a 1989 song by {{w|Hacken Lee}})''|C-LIT}}
# [[same]]; [[identical]]
#* {{zh-x|大小 不 一|having different sizes}}
# {{†}} [[another]]; [[alternative]]
#* {{zh-x|蟋蟀，一 名 促織|Crickets, also called ''cùzhī'' [lit. '''another''' name [being] cùzhī].}}
# {{n-g|With the verb modified reduplicated, expressing the transience of the verb.}}
## {{n-g|Indicating that the action has occurred only once.}}
##* {{zh-x|看 一 看|to have '''a''' look}}
## {{n-g|Indicating the intention to try.}}
##* {{zh-x|算 一 算|to '''try''' to calculate it}}
# [[once]]; [[as soon as]]; [[upon]]
#* {{zh-x|一 到 OP 就 卡|it slows down '''once''' I get to the opening}}
#* {{zh-x|我 一 開口，她 就 飛快 的 跑開 了。|'''As soon as''' I opened my mouth, she ran away at the speed of light.|ref={{w2|zh|伍佰}}, {{lang|zh|火山}}}}
# {{†}} for the [[first]] [[time]]; at the [[beginning]]
#* {{zh-x|一見如故|to hit it off}}
# {{†}} [[surprisingly]]; [[unexpectedly]]
#* {{zh-x|一至於此|How did things ever get so far?}}

===Etymology 1===
From {{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=いち}} {{m|zh|sc=Hani|一}}, from {{etyl|och|ja}} {{m|och|*yit|*<sup>?</sup>yit}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|いち|acc=2|dev=2|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|a=Ja-1-ichi.ogg}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|いち}}

# [[one]], [[1]]
# the [[beginning]]
# [[unity]]

====Numeral====
{{cardinalbox|ja|0|1|2|零|二}}
{{ja-pos|numeral|いち}}

# {{lb|ja|cardinal|sort=1}} [[one]], [[1]]

=====Idioms=====
* 一[[から]][[やり直す]]
*: いちからやりなおす
*: ''ichi kara yarinaosu''
*: start over from scratch
* 一[[から]][[十]][[まで]]
*: いちからじゅうまで
*: ''ichi [[kara]] jū [[made]]''
*: (literally. from '''one''' to ten)
*: all, without exception; from A to Z
* [[一か八か]]
*: いちかばちか
*: ''ichi ka bachi ka''
*: it's a gamble; sink or swim
* 一もにも無く
*: いちもにもなく
*: ''ichi mo ni mo naku''
*: unhesitatingly

===Etymology 2===

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|いつ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|acc2=2|acc2_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|いつ}}

# [[one]]

===Etymology 3===
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ひと}}.

<span class="IPA">/hito<small>2</small>/: [pitə] > [ɸitə] > [ɸito] > [çito]</span>

====Pronunciation====
* [[訓読み|Kun'yomi]]
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[çito̞]}}

====Number====
{{ja-pos|numeral|ひと}}

# {{lb|ja|cardinal|sort=1}} [[one]]

===Etymology 4===
From {{m|ja|始め|tr=hajime||beginning, first}}, stem noun form of verb {{m|ja|始める|tr=hajimeru||to begin something}}. The use of the kanji {{lang|ja|一}} for the reading ''hajime'' is an example of {{l|ja|熟字訓|tr=jukujikun}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ha̠d͡ʑime̞]}}

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|はじめ|proper}}

# {{given name|male|lang=ja|sort=はじめ}}
